      • EntEllipse

        public EntEllipse()
        Constructor (empty) default Ellipse.

      • EntEllipse

        public EntEllipse(wPoint cP,
          wPoint lP,
          double ratio_value,
          double sAngle_value,
          double eAngle_value)
        Constructor (cP,lP,ratio_value,sAngle_value,eAngle_value)
        参数:
        cP - - center point of the Ellipse;
        lP - - End point of the Ellipse on the long axis;
        ratio_value - - Ratio of the Ellipse;
        sAngle_value - - start angle of the Ellipse;
        eAngle_value - - end angle of the Ellipse;

      • EntEllipse

        public EntEllipse(double xc_value,
          double yc_value,
          double zc_value,
          double xl_value,
          double yl_value,
          double zl_value,
          double ratio_value,
          double sAngle_value,
          double eAngle_value)
        Constructor (xc_value, yc_value, zc_value, xl_value, yl_value, zl_value, ratio_value, sAngle_value,eAngle_value)
        参数:
        xc_value - - x of the Ellipse's center point;
        yc_value - - y of the Ellipse's center point;
        zc_value - - z of the Ellipse's center point;
        xl_value - - x of the Ellipse's long axis point;
        yl_value - - y of the Ellipse's long axis point;
        zl_value - - z of the Ellipse's long axis point;
        ratio_value - - ratio of the Ellipse(short axis / long axis);
        sAngle_value - - start angle of the Ellipse;
        eAngle_value - - end angle of the Ellipse;
